mapper.insert: insert into contact (user_id, goods_id, title, content, type) VALUE (#{user_id}, #{goods_id}, #{title}, #{content} ,#{type})
mapper.update: update contact set status=#{status}, answer=#{answer} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, goods_id, title, content, status, answer, regdate, type FROM contact ORDER BY regdate DESC limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
